dmca.title: Forgotten Boys complains of unauthorized mp3 downloads
dmca.body:
Forgotten Boys is a brazilian rock band that works at ST2 Music, an independent label that works in Brasil with artists from many countries. Check the links to ST2 Music website and Forgotten Boys page.
 
http://www.st2.com/br.st2_new/st2_records/detalhes_produto.asp?id=471
http://www.forgottenboys.com.br/
 
There is a blog  promoting Forgotten Boys songs by unauthorized mp3 downloads 
http://sonhomedio84.blogspot.com/

Post: Thursday, December 15, 2005 
Permalink:  http://sonhomedio84.blogspot.com/2005/12/forgottenboys-standbythedance-2005.html
 
Our contact is: [private]@st2.com.br 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

[private]
Marketing ST2 Music.
